title: Emerald Blossom Diamond Jhumka - Bridal Collection
materials: meticulously set with dazzling White Diamonds (VVS clarity
Excellent cut). Features a vibrant Emerald gemstone (superior clarity
features: These exquisite Jhumkas feature a floral motif at the top, leading to a delicate diamond-studded centerpiece and culminating in a beautifully detailed, dome-shaped Jhumka. The dome is adorned with a teardrop pattern of diamonds, finished with dainty pearl drops at the bottom, echoing the traditional South Indian Jhumka design, but with a contemporary touch.
colors: Classic combination of vibrant green Emerald
occasions: or any grand celebration. Also suitable for high-end parties and festive occasions where you want to make a statement.
description: These Jhumkas are a perfect blend of tradition and modern elegance. The high-quality diamonds and emerald, combined with the expert craftsmanship, ensure a lasting heirloom piece. The intricate design reflects the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
